content:
Hi All,

Just a bit of heads up (that I really should have posted here last week! what a crazy 7 days this has been) : We are having our usual webinar for the August 5.1.0 (Manticore) release of HAPI FHIR. Details can be found here: https://blog.smilecdr.com/2020/08/07/hapi-fhir-and-smile-cdr-august-2020-manticore-release-webinar/
